member.name: T:bin2js.StringExtension
member.summary: Some StringExtansion.

member.name: F:bin2js.StringExtension.extansions
member.summary: A string array which holds a lot of extansions, which we will use to compare against paths / filenames to determine the extansion of the actual work file.

member.name: M:bin2js.StringExtension.Contains(System.String,System.String,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Checks if a string do contain a specific string including StringCoparison option.
member.param: The string that shall be looked for.
member.returns: True if the string to look for was found., else false.

member.name: M:bin2js.StringExtension.Contain(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a string do contain a specific string including StringCoparison option. (Auto ignoreCase)
member.param: The string that shall be looked for.
member.returns: True if the string to look for was found., else false.

member.summary: Write a string to a file.
member.param: The arguments that shall be swapped with the place holders.

member.summary: Write a string to a file.
member.param: The arguments that shall be swapped with the place holders.

member.name: M:bin2js.StringExtension.GetName(System.String)
member.summary: Trims the path out of a name. Name can be last folder in string or file.
member.returns: The name without any back slashes or path in it.

member.name: M:bin2js.StringExtension.GetPath(System.String)
member.summary: Trim the name out of a path. Name can be last folder in string or file.
member.returns: The path without the last folder or the file in the string.

member.name: M:bin2js.StringExtension.TestFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Tests if a file already exists and change the name if needed, then returns it. (Adds a number to the file on end before the extansion)
member.param: The String to Test if the file exists.
member.returns: The String that we can use to create a new file.

member.name: M:bin2js.StringExtension.XReplace(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: XReg Replace some pattern from a source string with a given string.
member.returns: The Replaced string, if any found.
